options.label: C
options.text: Lower parathyroid glands are inferior to the junction of the inferior thyroid artery and RLN (recurrent laryngeal nerve)

questions.correct_answer: D. The superior parathyroid glands are located anterior to RLN (recurrent laryngeal nerve)
